solution_line_template: She will keep {total_tokens} / {keep_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_tokens}/{keep_fraction_denominator}={sandy_tokens}>>{sandy_tokens} Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive {sandy_tokens} / {siblings} = <<{sandy_tokens}/{siblings}={sibling_tokens}>>{sibling_tokens} tokens.
This means that Sandy will have {sandy_tokens} - {sibling_tokens} = <<{sandy_tokens}-{sibling_tokens}={tokens_more_than_sibling}>>{tokens_more_than_sibling} tokens more than any of her siblings.
